meanings.definition: To put (a dead body) in the ground for burial.
meanings.sent1: She buries her beloved pet in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The family buries their grandfather in the cemetery.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel buries its acorns for safekeeping.
meanings.sent4: Time buries all secrets in the end.
meanings.sent5: The heavy rain buries the garden under mud.

meanings.definition: To cover (something) completely with a substance.
meanings.sent1: He buries the treasure chest in the sand.
meanings.sent2: The snow buries the car overnight.
meanings.sent3: The chef buries the pasta in a mountain of cheese.
meanings.sent4: The darkness buries the city in shadows.
meanings.sent5: The avalanche buries the mountain path.

meanings.sent1: The pirate buries the map on the deserted island.
meanings.sent2: She buries her favorite book in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The dog buries its bone in the garden, forgetting where.
meanings.sent4: The past buries its secrets deep within us.
meanings.sent5: The archaeologist buries the ancient artifact for future discovery.
